summary: Fixed all 5 bugs identified in the Beauty Booking module bug report. BUG-001 (High Priority): Added DB::transaction() wrapper to createBooking() method to ensure atomicity of booking creation operations. BUG-002 (Medium Priority): Added return type hints to review() and transaction() methods in BeautyBooking entity. BUG-003 (Medium Priority): Added return type hint to activeSubscription() method in BeautySalon entity. BUG-SEC-001 and BUG-SEC-002 (Medium Priority): Added comprehensive comments explaining why whereRaw is used and confirming parameter binding safety. All changes maintain code quality standards and pass linter checks.
current_status: All identified bugs have been fixed. The module now has improved transaction safety, better type safety with return type hints, and documented whereRaw usage for security review. Ready for testing and deployment.
